name: Submarine Search
description:
While hanging out on the beach, you were visited by the evil King Crab, who wanted your precious rubber ducky. You obviously refused, cause R U B B E R  D U C K Y, so King Crab was not too happy, cause he wants a rubber duck to swim with too. So he took the ducky and tried to kill you. But luckily, you escaped by hiding in an old submarine. You got it to work to save your ducky. Can you save your ducky before time runs out?

Your submarine is very weak, so it requires your HP to run its flashlight, protection, and movement. You can also trade your HP to get cool upgrades, like an HP Multiplier, Missiles, and more! Use them to beat that evil King Crab!
